川辺: (かわべ) - riverside; edge of a river

州: (shuu/su) - state , state, province, county, oblast, department (of ancient China); continent

巡: (junho/megu) - patrol , counter for tours, cycles, rounds, circuits, etc.
巡らす: (めぐらす) - to enclose (with)/to surround (with)/to encircle; to turn (one's head, heel, etc.); to think over/to work out; to notify (orally or in writing)

巡り巡って: (めぐりめぐって) - (after) bouncing around from one place to the next

巡り逢う: (めぐりあう) - to meet fortuitously (e.g. running into an old friend); to meet by chance; to happen across
巡る: (meguru) - to go around; to return , to go around; to return; to surround; to concern (uso de disputas)
